data.original_prompt: Company XYZ has implemented a new remote work policy that allows employees to work from home three days a week. What is the frequency of remote work allowed under Company XYZ's new policy?
data.original_answer: The frequency of remote work allowed under Company XYZ's new policy is three days a week.

data.original_prompt: The board of directors at Acme Corp has recently expanded from 8 to 12 members to increase diversity. How many new members were added to the board of Acme Corp?
data.original_answer: 4 new members were added to the board of Acme Corp.

data.original_prompt: As part of its sustainability initiative, TechnoGlobal has reduced its carbon emissions by 15% over the last year. What percentage did TechnoGlobal reduce its carbon emissions by last year?
data.original_answer: TechnoGlobal reduced its carbon emissions by 15% last year.

data.original_prompt: DeltaTech introduced a comprehensive health plan in 2021 that covers mental health, dental, and vision care. What types of health coverage does the new plan at DeltaTech include?
data.original_answer: The new plan at DeltaTech includes mental health, dental, and vision care coverage.

data.original_prompt: During the annual general meeting, shareholders voted on three major proposals, and all proposals were approved. How many proposals were approved during the annual general meeting?
data.original_answer: Three proposals were approved during the annual general meeting.

data.original_prompt: HR department at Widget Co. has launched a new training program focusing on digital skills for all employees. What is the focus of Widget Co.'s new training program?
data.original_answer: The focus of Widget Co.'s new training program is digital skills.

data.original_prompt: In 2023, Nexus Enterprises moved its headquarters from Chicago to Austin. Where did Nexus Enterprises relocate its headquarters?
data.original_answer: Nexus Enterprises relocated its headquarters to Austin.

data.original_prompt: The marketing team at SolarFusion will be increasing its budget by 20% to promote new photovoltaic products. By what percentage will SolarFusion increase its marketing budget?
data.original_answer: SolarFusion will increase its marketing budget by 20%.

data.original_prompt: To enhance efficiency, Vortex Inc. has automated 30% of its production line using robotics. What portion of Vortex Inc.'s production line has been automated?
data.original_answer: The portion of Vortex Inc.'s production line that has been automated is 30%.

data.original_prompt: Brightside NGO has expanded its outreach program to include five additional cities this year. How many cities has Brightside NGO added to its outreach program?
data.original_answer: Brightside NGO has added five cities to its outreach program.
